text: Ton Frinking (1 February 1931 â€“ 3 August 2022) was a Dutch politician. He was in the Royal Netherlands Army as a lieutenant colonel. He was a member of the House of Representatives of Netherlands from 1977 to 1993 for the Christian Democratic Appeal and Catholic People's Party. He was born in Groningen, Netherlands. Frinking died in August 2022 in Delft, Netherlands at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Catholic People's Party politicians Category:Christian Democratic Appeal politicians Category:Colonels Category:Deputy government ministers of the Netherlands Category:Dutch military people Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Politicians from Groningen (city)
title: Ton Frinking
